channel.title: Make server onlise for player join
channel.description: hey mates.. i have 1 problem. i click "run-server" to server be online then "run" so i can enter i enter yeah i can play i maked a java for the download client and i send to my friend and he said he got" error connecting to server" when e put pass and username. can someone tell me wat i need to do? (revision is 317) thank you ~alex

item.title: Make server onlise for player join

item.description:
@hellomynameisyou wrote:

hey mates…
i have 1 problem.
i click “run-server” to server be online then “run” so i can enter
i enter yeah i can play
i maked a java for the download client and i send to my friend and he said he got" error connecting to server" when e put pass and username.
can someone tell me wat i need to do? (revision is 317)
thank you
~alex
